Package com.example.repository

Interface LotRepository

@RepositoryDefinition(domainClass=Lot.class, idClass=java.lang.Long.class) public interface LotRepository
Repository interface for managing Lot entities. Provides methods to query active lots for a specific item and their count.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Long
    countActiveLots(long item)
    Retrieves the total count of active lots for a specific item.
    List<Lot>
    findActiveLots(long item, long pageSize, long pageNumber)
    Retrieves a list of active lots for a specific item with pagination.

  • Method Details

    • findActiveLots

      @Query("select lot.id, lot.user_login as login, cost_current as current, cost_buy as buy, time_end as \"end\" from lot join lot_cost_information lci on lot.id = lci.lot_id join lot_status_information lsi on lot.id = lsi.lot_id join lot_time_information lti on lot.id = lti.lot_id where item_id = :item and status = \'ACTIVE\' limit :page_size offset :page_number * :page_size") List<Lot> findActiveLots(@Param("item") long item, @Param("page_size") long pageSize, @Param("page_number") long pageNumber)
      Retrieves a list of active lots for a specific item with pagination.
      Parameters:
      item - the ID of the item for which the active lots are retrieved
      pageSize - the number of lots per page
      pageNumber - the page number for pagination
      Returns:
      a list of active lots for the specified item

    • countActiveLots

      @Query("select count(*) from lot join lot_status_information lsi on lot.id = lsi.lot_id where item_id = :item and status = \'ACTIVE\'") Long countActiveLots(@Param("item") long item)
      Retrieves the total count of active lots for a specific item.
      Parameters:
      item - the ID of the item for which the active lot count is retrieved
      Returns:
      the total count of active lots for the specified item
